name: colcannon
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an Irish dish made from potatoes and cabbage, boiled and mashed (= crushed), together with fried onion, butter, milk, and herbs: We chose red potatoes for our colcannon for their dense, waxy texture. Place a spoon of Colcannon on each plate, and put a haddock fillet on top.
More examplesFewer examplesColcannon is an Irish favourite — buttery mashed potato folded with winter greens, kale, seaweed, or cabbage.For an extra-decadent treat, fry up leftover colcannon the next day in two tablespoons of olive oil.Colcannon is traditionally served at Halloween with a coin mixed in.
